name: BerryRPG
description:
A legendary adventure starring BerryCrepe. This game isn't for the faint of heart. What secrets lie in wait?

  • Hardcore JRPG  Combat
  • Frustrating puzzles
  • Classic JRPG bugs
  • Memes

Estimated first time game time: 10 to 20 minutes. Leave a comment with your completion time!
